actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 218 of the Social Security Act to permit the modification of certain Federal-State agreements to give noncovered State and local employees under the divided retirement system procedure an additional opportunity to elect coverage.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Permits the modification of Federal-State agreements to give State and local employees not covered under the old-age, survivors and disability insurance program of the Social Security Act the opportunity to elect coverage under the divided retirement system procedure until 1976.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 218 of the Social Security Act to permit the modification of certain Federal-State agreements to give noncovered State and local employees under the divided retirement system procedure an additional opportunity to elect coverage.
